title: Device Settings Accessibility Resource Type
description: Smart Data Models Program adaptation of the original IoTData data Models. Gets current device accessibility settings.

rt.description: Property. The Resource Type of Device Settings for accessibility

voice-guide.description: Property. Turns on or off voice guide.

video-description.description: Property. Turns on or off video description.

caption.description: Property. Turns on or off accessibility caption.

caption-mode.description: Property. Accessibility Caption Mode. Client can change caption-mode using supported-caption-modes property.

supported-caption-modes.description: Property. The array of possible caption modes the device supports. This property should be added if caption-mode is supported.

high-contrast.description: Property. Turns on or off high contrast.

enlarge.description: Property. Turns on or off print enlargement.

type.description: Property. NGSI entity type. It has to be settings-accessibility
